summary: This document is a cover letter from Bank of America to the United States Attorney's Office in New York, providing encryption keys and instructions for accessing financial records produced in response to a subpoena related to case number 2019R01059. It indicates the bank is complying with a legal request for records in the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Bank of America subpoena response delivery
events.description: Bank of America sends encrypted financial records on CD-ROM to the United States Attorney's Office in New York in response to a subpoena related to case 2019R01059.

locations: ONE ST. ANDREW'S PLAZA NEW YORK, NY 10007
keyFacts: Bank of America was subpoenaed for financial records in case 2019R01059, which appears to be related to the Epstein investigation.
The bank produced encrypted records on CD-ROM for security purposes on September 12, 2019.
The United States Attorney's Office in New York (Southern District) was the recipient of these financial records.
The document provides technical instructions for accessing the encrypted financial data using a provided password.
This indicates financial investigation activities were ongoing in September 2019 regarding the Epstein case.
